eventList.title: Barbershop
eventList.blurb: A day in the life of a South Side Chicago barbershop.

eventList.title: Barbershop: The Next Cut
eventList.blurb: As their surrounding community has taken a turn for the worse, the crew at Calvin's Barbershop come together to bring some much needed change to their neighborhood.

eventList.title: Barbershop: Back in Business
eventList.blurb: Why not spend another day with the crew at Calvin's shop in the South Side of Chicago?
